item.title: Kali Linux NetHunter: The Portable Penetration Testing Platform ðŸ’»
item.description: Kali Linux NetHunter is a Debian-based Linux distribution aimed at professional penetration testers and security researchers. It is a free and open-source mobile penetration testing platform for Android devices.
item.author: ericdequevedo@gmailcom (Eric deQuevedo)
